metadata.title: CVE-2023-1652 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in nfsd4_ssc_setup_dul infs/nfsd/nfs4proc.c in the NFS filesystem in the Linux Kernel. This issuecould allow a local attacker to crash the system or it may lead to a kernelinformation leak problem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1652` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.2.0-20.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1001-ibm - 6.2.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1003.3

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
